item.title: Report E-2024030092
item.description:
Report E-2024030092

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-07T15:11:21+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-22
  • City: MORGANTOWN
  • State: WV
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: SAFETY-KLEEN SYSTEMS, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: Driver was delivering solvent to customer and when filling drum for customer driver did not get the valve shut off quick enough to prevent over filling container resulting in less than a gallon of liquid onto the floor of the truck. Solvent was wiped up with absorbents and disposed of in the appropriate manor.
